title: MCA Student
summary: Highly motivated MCA student with practical experience in Full-Stack Development, AI/ML Integration, and Robust Security Systems. Proficient in Python, JavaScript, Java, and SQL, with expertise in Software Engineering Principles, Microservices Architecture, and Database Management. Proven ability to develop and deploy High-Performance Applications, integrate Advanced APIs, and implement Secure Solutions. Seeking to leverage technical expertise to contribute to innovative software projects and drive technological growth.

bullets: Engineered an AI-powered HR assistant, People Nexus, utilizing RAG architecture to achieve 95% accuracy in complex document-based queries.
Designed and optimized a prompt engineering pipeline with OpenAI APIs for context-aware responses and effective hallucination prevention.
Technologies Used: React/Next.js, Node.js, Python/FastAPI, Vector DB, OpenAI API, JWT, Docker.
items.name: People Nexus

bullets: Developed CypherStack, a desktop file security application using Java and JavaFX, incorporating AES-256 encryption to guarantee 100% data protection.
Implemented a real-time Intrusion Detection System (IDS) for file access pattern monitoring, achieving a 98% detection rate for simulated malicious activities.
Enhanced performance for large file encryption by implementing multi-threading, resulting in a 35% reduction in processing time.
items.name: CypherStack
